content.text: All Eduversal Partner Schools must operate in full compliance with the laws and regulations of the Republic of Indonesia. The foundation of our compliance is the National Education System Law (UU Sisdiknas).

content.title: Key Regulations
items: UU No. 20 Tahun 2003 tentang Sistem Pendidikan Nasional
PP No. 57 Tahun 2021 tentang Standar Nasional Pendidikan

content.text: Maintaining valid operational licenses is critical. Schools must ensure all licenses are up-to-date and reflect current operations.

steps.title: Audit
steps.desc: Check expiration dates of Izin Prinsip and Izin Operasional annually.

steps.title: Preparation
steps.desc: Prepare required documents (curriculum, facilities, staffing) 6 months before expiration.

steps.title: Submission
steps.desc: Submit renewal applications to OSS (Online Single Submission) or local Dinas.

content.text: Accurate and timely reporting to Data Pokok Pendidikan (Dapodik) is mandatory for student NISN registration, teacher certification, and school accreditation.

content.title: Reporting Deadlines
items: Monthly updates for attendance and staffing changes

content.text: Schools must implement the mandatory national curriculum subjects alongside the Cambridge curriculum.

content.title: Mandatory Subjects
rows: Mandatory for all students according to their faith
